__[Github repo](https://github.com/JerryI/wljs-markdown-support)__
To switch to Markdown language with LaTeX support use `.md` prefix on the first line

<Notebook code="" name="diatom-a26e6">diatom-a26e6</Notebook>

## Template Engine

WSP template engine allows to use Wolfram Language to process the text like PHP (see [more here](https://github.com/JerryI/tinyweb-mathematica)). For example, to create a list in Markdown one can do

<Notebook code="" name="industriousness-6dfb5">industriousness-6dfb5</Notebook>

:::danger
There is a bug in WSP Engine, that removes whitespaces before and after the `<?wsp` tag.
:::
